Author: Timwi
Description: Throw a sequence of numbers into a black hole. Several Black Hole modules combine into a bigger puzzle. Interspersing with other modules provides a shortcut. Tags: circle, colored-swirl
Name: Black Hole

Souvenir.Explanation: In the case where there is more than one Black Hole on the bomb, Souvenir could ask which one (identified by the order in which they were solved) received the nth digit of the code.
